General.Name: Knight Club Capital Asset Management PCL
General.Description: Knight Club Capital Asset Management Public Company Limited engages in the management of non-performing assets in Thailand. The company manages non-performing loans; as well as debt restruction and financial debt consulting to companies and individuals to aid in debt restructuring. It operates a non-performing asset of foreclosed properties for development, renovation, and sale; and provides debt management services for corporate and housing loans. Knight Club Capital Asset Management Public Company Limited was incorporated in 2000 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
